titles.title: Twenty Fifth Sunday in ordinary time Year C

properties.verseOrder: c1 v1 c1 v2 c1 v3 c1

verse.name: c1
verse.lines:
Praise the Lord,
who raises the poor
from the dust.

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Praise, O servants of the Lord,
praise the name of the Lord!
May the name of the Lord
be blest,
both now and forevermore.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
High above all nations is the Lord,
above the heavens his glory,
Who is like the Lord, our God.
who dwells on high,
who lowers himself to look down
upon heaven and earth?

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
From the dust
he lifts up the lowly,
from the ash heap
he raises the poor,
to set them in the company
of princes, yes,
with the princes
of his people.
